features.description: You lie dormant until a creature moves within 30 ft. of you. You may then activate immediately and use Straight Shot. You remain active for up to 1 minute.

features.name: Straight Shot
features.description: Ranged: +5 to hit, ranged 30 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

features.name: Decaying Twinshot
features.description: Ranged: +5 to hit, ranged 30 ft., two creatures. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) ongoing necrotic damage (save ends, DC 13 CON).
